Initialising Minima¶

Initialise Example¶

Minima.init( function( msg ) {

  console.log("minima event", msg)

  if ( msg.event == "connected" ) {

    console.log("connected");

  }
});

Minima.init allows you to specify a callback that enables you to monitor Minima events.

minima.js
